title: Canadian Companies That Support Mobile?
body:
So I see here when trying to purchase RP through mobile, that Rogers is no longer supporting it. I know that Wind doesn't either, considering I just tried. 

I'm curious. What companies _**DO**_ support the mobile payments in Canada?

Telus? Koodo? Bell? 

Can any Canadians help me out? I've tried looking it up but I'm really coming up short!

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
We support [Boku Payments](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753264-Boku-Mobile-Payment-and-Internet-) in Canada, but you'll probably want to reach a representative at some of the mobile providers in Canada to specifically ask if they support Boku.

Hopefully, some Canadians swing by to offer their advice. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Thank you, I appreciate the suggestion. I'll try to call around different companies and see what they have to say. Thanks again.
